tasks.task: Farming operation with biochar in manure management
subtasks: Define biochar production process and characteristics
Discuss biochar as a soil amendment and its benefits
Explain phosphorus management in manure solids through biochar
Evaluate nutrient retention and mass reduction using biochar
Report on reducing ammonia emissions through biochar application
Investigate biochar's impact on hydrogen sulfide reduction in anaerobic digestion
Highlight the importance of temperature and feedstock in biochar effectiveness
Address the high cost of biochar production and future potential for incentives

tasks.task: Operate biochar pyrolysis system for manure solids management
subtasks: Load manure solids into pyrolysis reactor
Monitor pyrolysis temperature and duration
Unload biochar from reactor
Transport biochar to field application site

tasks.task: Apply biochar to fields
subtasks: Mix biochar into soil using a spreader

tasks.task: Cover manure storages with biochar
subtasks: Load biochar into spreader or cart
Transport biochar to manure storage area
Spread biochar evenly across storage surface

tasks.task: Add biochar to anaerobic digester
subtasks: Mix biochar into feedstock manually or via pump

tasks.task: Monitor carbon sequestration efforts
Collect nutrient samples for analysis
